entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
